hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
HOSTNAME=`hostname` IP=`ip address show eth0 | grep -Po 'inet (\d+\.?){4}' | awk '{print $2}'` echo "${IP} ${HOSTNAME}.slave.openstack.org ${HOSTNAME}" | sudo tee -a /etc/hosts
echo "net.ipv4.ip_forward=1" | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf echo "net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter=0" | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf echo "net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter=0" | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf sudo sysctl -p
cat >>/home/ubuntu/.ssh/known_hosts<<EOF |1|uIxKelxcdnTa4n0PE/2qedyc46A=|50eJhdVjUgjtcdqAJIa5CB8SBJs= ssh-rsa  EOF
sudo pip uninstall -y ncclient NCCLIENT_DIR=/opt/git/ncclient sudo git clone -b master https://github.com/CiscoSystems/ncclient.git ${NCCLIENT_DIR} cd ${NCCLIENT_DIR} sudo python setup.py install cd ${WORKSPACE}
./run_ml2_smoke_zuul.sh || :
cp /opt/stack/logs/stack.sh.log ${WORKSPACE}/
cd /opt/stack/tempest || : testr last --subunit | subunit-1to2 | subunit2junitxml --output-to="${WORKSPACE}/testr_results.xml" || : testr last --subunit > "${WORKSPACE}/testr_results.subunit" || :
cd ${WORKSPACE} wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/openstack-infra/config/master/modules/openstack_project/files/slave_scripts/subunit2html.py python subunit2html.py testr_results.subunit testr_results.html || :

files='console.txt localrc' cp ${WORKSPACE}/testr_results* /opt/stack/logs
cat >>/home/ubuntu/.ssh/known_hosts<<EOF |1|ejnKhkRrj96mJj9pv6WJtTDdpN4=|nq2bLYfJOD7AD+rO4SHwFysf9Ow= ecdsa-sha2-nistp256 AAAAE2VjZHNhLXNoYTItbmlzdHAyNTYAAAAIbmlzdHAyNTYAAABBBK++7Bpvy60tgFtzc02N9K91N7+DXo+Cr6xuxLZv9nsqx4LXVrrh2pge5OwljtChnYNJyz3lc81rvmwmE7OU4TA= EOF
pass='N3u+r0N' logpass=/home/cisco_neutron_ci/jlogs/${JOB_NAME}/${BUILD_NUMBER}/ sshpass -p ${pass} ssh cisco_neutron_ci@128.107.233.28 mkdir -p ${logpass} || : sshpass -p ${pass} rsync -ave ssh ${files} cisco_neutron_ci@128.107.233.28:${logpass} || :
cd /opt/stack find ./logs -regex './.*[0-9]+-[0-9]+\.log$' | sed -e 's|./||' > /tmp/exclude_list.txt sshpass -p ${pass} rsync --copy-links --exclude-from=/tmp/exclude_list.txt -ave ssh logs cisco_neutron_ci@128.107.233.28:${logpass} || :
sshpass -p ${pass} ssh cisco_neutron_ci@128.107.233.28 gzip -9 "${logpass}*" || : sshpass -p ${pass} ssh cisco_neutron_ci@128.107.233.28 gzip -9 "${logpass}/logs/*" || :
tar -zcf "${WORKSPACE}/stack_logs.tar.gz" /opt/stack/logs || : tar -zcf "${WORKSPACE}/etc.tar.gz" /etc || :
# if stack.sh failed there is not such folder. The job should fail too cd /opt/stack/tempest
